CSSBorder-inline-style.summary: The border-inline-style CSS property defines the style of the logical inline borders of an element, which maps to a physical border style depending on the element's writing mode, directionality, and text orientation. It corresponds to the border-top-style and border-bottom-style, or border-left-style and border-right-style properties depending on the values defined for writing-mode, direction, and text-orientation.

remarks.para: The border style in the other dimension can be set with border-block-style, which sets border-block-start-style, and border-block-end-style.

-CSS Logical Properties and Values
-This property maps to one of the physical border properties: border-top-style, border-right-style, border-bottom-style, or border-left-style.
-writing-mode, direction, text-orientation
